bill_title: prohibit certain administrators of state boards or commissions from lobbying for other entities.

bill_versions.bill_text: FOR AN ACT ENTITLED, An Act to prohibit certain administrators of state boards or commissions from lobbying for other entities. BE IT ENACTED BY THE LEGISLATURE OF THE STATE OF SOUTH DAKOTA: Section 1. That chapter 2-12 be amended by adding a NEW SECTION to read: A person who is the executive director or the executive secretary of any state board or commission may only act or register as a lobbyist for the board or commission for which the person serves as executive director or executive secretary. A violation of this section is a Class 1 misdemeanor. 100 copies were printed on recycled paper by the South Dakota Legislative Research Council at a cost of $.161 per page. . Insertions into existing statutes are indicated by underscores. Deletions from existing statutes are indicated by overstrikes.

action_log.status_text: First read in Senate and referred to
Withdrawn at the Request of the Prime Sponsor
